column2: "Oh power of darkness slumbering within... By the ancient oath sworn, I decree..."
"Ah, they're here! ...Wait, it's you."
"Don't make that face at me. You were just approved recently, weren't you? For the new Phantom class."
"Which means its representative is going to show up and somehow rope me into advertising for them, right?"
"...Just refuse? But everyone else is working so hard, I'd feel bad doing that..."
"So I've been practicing for when they do ask me."
"And I helped out Stratos, after all... Now, answer my summons! O' Master of Phantoms...!"
"The one who called for me, for Phantom... Was it you?"
"Uwahh! I really summoned him...?!"
"You again, <%me>. For you to have arrived before me... you must be one who is fascinated with death."
"...I don't really think that's the case here. More importantly..."
"How do you want me to spread the word about Phantom? I'll do whatever you want!"
"I-I've been practicing that line... for a while..."
"...What are you talking about? Who asked you for anything?"
"Huh? B-But..."
"I heard your call and answered your summons... But it was just a foolish prank."
"W-wait a minute! You're not going to advertise the new class? Don't you want it to grow?"
"...If you really desire to do so, then go ahead."
"N-No no no, I don't want to! But both Katori and Stratos both worked so hard to spread awareness of their classes..."
"It is unnecessary. Phantoms are Phantoms... We who dwell in the darkness."
"We do not understand those who see naught but \"light\" where the sunlight strikes..."
"...I will leave you one piece of advice. Phantoms are not to be associated with."
"Those who gaze into the \"shadows\" will inevitably be swallowed by them..."
"One more thing... That \"Aria\" of yours... It is coming along nicely."
"With enough practice, you too could master it... Farewell."
"...Wow, <%me>. You're still making friends with some really strange people..."
"...Wait, if I wasn't advertising anything, then I've just been reciting that aria in front of everyone in the Shop Area for no reason!"
"Uwaaah...! How embarrassing..."
